languages.text: "То, что враги Человечества видят в тебе конкурент{mf|а|ку} в борьбе за души Человечества, не значит, что ты чист{mf||а} перед нами".
"That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
languages.original_text: "То, что враги Человечества видят в тебе конкурент{mf|а|ку} в борьбе за души Человечества, не значит, что ты чист{mf||а} перед нами".

traits.locale_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their competitor in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their competitor in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their competitor in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their competitor in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “人类之敌将你视为抢夺人类灵魂的竞争对手，但在本法庭看来，这并不能免除你的罪责。”
languages.original_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."

traits.locale_text: “人类之敌将你视为抢夺人类灵魂的竞争对手，但在本法庭看来，这并不能免除你的罪责。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「人類の敵がお前を競争相手と見なし、人間としての魂をかけて戦っている。だからと言って、お前が私の裁きから逃れる理由にはならない」
languages.original_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の敵がお前を競争相手と見なし、人間としての魂をかけて戦っている。だからと言って、お前が私の裁きから逃れる理由にはならない」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Que los enemigos de la humanidad {mf|le|la} vean como rival en la lucha por las almas de la humanidad no {mf|le|la} absuelve a ojos de este tribunal».
languages.original_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."

traits.locale_text: «Que los enemigos de la humanidad {mf|le|la} vean como rival en la lucha por las almas de la humanidad no {mf|le|la} absuelve a ojos de este tribunal».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Dass die Feinde der Menschheit Euch als ihre Konkurrenz im Kampf um Menschenseelen sehen, spricht in den Augen dieses Gerichts nicht für Eure Unschuld."
languages.original_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."

traits.locale_text: "Dass die Feinde der Menschheit Euch als ihre Konkurrenz im Kampf um Menschenseelen sehen, spricht in den Augen dieses Gerichts nicht für Eure Unschuld."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Que les xénos vous considèrent comme {mf|un rival|une rivale} dans leur chasse aux âmes humaines ne vous absout pas aux yeux de cette cour. »
languages.original_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."

traits.locale_text: « Que les xénos vous considèrent comme {mf|un rival|une rivale} dans leur chasse aux âmes humaines ne vous absout pas aux yeux de cette cour. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "İnsanlığın ruhları uğruna verilen savaşta İnsanlığın düşmanlarının seni rakip olarak görüyor olması, seni bu mahkemenin gözünde aklamaz."
languages.original_text: "That the enemies of Humanity see you as their rival in the fight for Humanity's souls does not absolve you in the eyes of this court."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın düşmanlarının İnsanlığın ruhları uğruna verdikleri savaşta seni rakipleri olarak görüyor olmaları, seni bu mahkemenin gözünde aklamaz."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
